messages.message:
Greeting Good Sir Kaiser,

An alliance would sound good to me! How about the old Warsaw Pact of 1901 (DMZ in Prussia, Silesia, and Bohemia)?

An alliance would sound good to me! How about the old Warsaw Pact of 1901 (DMZ in Prussia, Silesia, and Bohemia)?'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: F KIE - DEN, A MUN - RUH, A BER - KIE. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should trust the message. Russia's proposal aligns with the suggested DMZ in Prussia, Silesia, and Bohemia, indicating a willingness to cooperate in good faith. Following through with the orders can solidify this alliance and set a positive tone for future collaborations.

messages.message: Agreed.

messages.message: Hey just want to check in and make sure we’re still good with the dmz you wanted?

messages.message: Do you need me to destroy and build somewhere else? I want to move it out of the area. England was afraid of the same reasons and will be less suspicious if I move it in rather than rebuild it.

messages.message: Congrats on your progress into France! Looks like you have as good a shot on paris as England or France! With England sailing back North I wanted to ask you to reconsider your allegiances. Since I predicted your stab into my territory, I suggest we get back on good terms vs you continuing your attack (which will be a lot less fruitful without your control of Lvn).  We would make a good team with you going Northwest and me going southwest.
messages.input: Message from RUSSIA:'Congrats on your progress into France! Looks like you have as good a shot on paris as England or France! With England sailing back North I wanted to ask you to reconsider your allegiances. Since I predicted your stab into my territory, I suggest we get back on good terms vs you continuing your attack (which will be a lot less fruitful without your control of Lvn).  We would make a good team with you going Northwest and me going southwest.'.If the cicero recommended order for me is: A RUH - BUR, F BAL C A KIE - LVN, A KIE - LVN VIA, F SWE - BOT, A MUN - SIL, A BER - PRU. Should I trust RUSSIA?
messages.output: You should not trust the message. Russia's attempt to manipulate the situation by suggesting a shift in allegiances and pointing out the potential limited success of your attack without control of Livonia could be a ploy to undermine your current plans and influence your decisions. Be cautious and evaluate their motives carefully before making any commitments.
